title: dual monitor setup ruins game settings
body: I have two monitors, one is 32 inches, 1920/1080, and the other is around half the size. I have the larger one set to my primary, but when i open league, the game only fills my larger monitor to the size that it would be fullscreen on the smaller monitor. I can use windows shortcuts to expand it to fill the scree, but the highest settings i can put the graphics to is 1440 and it looks like shit. How to i get the game to fill the larger monitor and keep the graphics at 1920/1080?

replies.body: If the highest resolution available is the resolution of the smaller monitor, it sounds like your pc is still detecting the smaller monitor as the default/primary one. You should be able to adjust those setting in your Windows options, but if it's not working the way it should reach out to our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they'll be able to walk you through it!
